div.pre: 2170 Syracuse, c. 1770 (1027) Burial: late 4th-early 3rd cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 200 lbs AR Syracuse: Pegasi* * Early writers attribute all pegasi to Syra- cuse; assuming a Sicilian pound of about 320 gm., the hd. would have contained about 7400 pegasi Disposition: dispersed Eckhel, Doctrina num. vet. 1 (Leipzig, 1826), p. lxxxii
